name: Senior Data Analyst (Sales)
description:
OLX is looking for a motivated Senior Data Analyst (Sales) with the goal of giving analytical support to the business.

Your Opportunity

Do you believe in numbers? Do you feel excited about diving deep into data, drawing logical conclusions, performing complex statistical analysis and providing business insights? Do you seek to work on multiple projects spanning OLX’s various businesses across multiple EU markets? If the answer is Yes, we’re waiting for You – curious and passionate data driven person, who is at ease with analyzing large volumes of data and transforming it into smart business decisions to fulfill a position of Senior Data Analyst in OLX Ukraine office. This position will report to the Head of Business Intelligence and Analytics. As Senior Data Analyst you will help OLX businesses make smart decisions based on smart analysis.

What responsibilities will you get when working with us?

As a Senior Data Analyst in Sales and the member of the Business Intelligence and Analytics team you will dive into the world of OLX business clients’ data and face analytical challenges from the B2B department, with a focus on Sales analysis, reporting and planning. You will be able to get familiar with the Sales process and help shape the future of our offering to business clients, test and validate hypotheses, find sales team bottlenecks and areas for improvements, suggest solutions, implement KPIs tracking and setting, and see it all affect business performance.

What will you need to be successful in this role?

  • Bachelor’s/ Master’s degree in computer science, mathematics, IT
  • 4+ years’ demonstrated and relevant experience in Analytics
  • Ability to work with unstructured data (often Big Data)
  • 3+ years’ experience with SQL
  • R/Python programming language
  • Experience with SalesForce (integration, workflows and programming)
  • Aspiration to automation and optimized processes will be a plus
  • Prior experience in Product Analytics will be a plus
  • Ability to understand and gather complex reporting requirements and develop creative, highly graphical data representations
  • Strong written and verbal communication in Ukrainian/Russian/English
  • Ability to present insights in a concise and clear way
  • Understanding of statistical analysis and experience with systems testing A/ B will be a plus
  • Analytical, creative, and innovative approach to solving problems
  • Experience in e-commerce, internet projects will be a plus

What can you expect from us and what do we offer?

  • Employment in full compliance to the legislation of Ukraine
  • Competitive salary and great benefits (corporate English classes, compensation for health and sports services)
  • Medical insurance program after successful completion of the probation period
  • Contributing to the global Naspers Classifieds success
  • International career and travel opportunities (subject to COVID restrictions)
  • Learning and development support
  • Comfortable, light office in the city center (now we work remotely)


Empower yourself.
Improve the world.
Join OLX.
